# This file was autogenerated by the modm cmake builder. Do not modify!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
include(cmake/ModmConfiguration.cmake)
set_source_files_properties(
  src/modm/math/utils/avr/sqrt32.sx
  PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX
)

add_library(modm OBJECT
  ext/gcc/assert.cpp
  ext/gcc/atomic.cpp
  ext/gcc/cxxabi.cpp
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/functexcept.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/hash_bytes.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/hashtable_c++0x.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/limits.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/list.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/math.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/new_handler.cc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/src/tree.cc
  ext/gcc/new_delete.cpp
  src/modm/architecture/driver/atomic/flag.cpp
  src/modm/board/board.cpp
  src/modm/board/board_fuses.cpp
  src/modm/io/iostream.cpp
  src/modm/io/iostream_printf.cpp
  src/modm/math/utils/avr/sqrt32.sx
  src/modm/math/utils/bit_operation.cpp
  src/modm/platform/clock/clock.cpp
  src/modm/platform/core/assert.cpp
  src/modm/platform/uart/uart0_rx.cpp
  src/modm/platform/uart/uart0_tx.cpp
)
add_library(modm_warnings INTERFACE)
add_library(modm_options INTERFACE)
add_library(modm_arch_options INTERFACE)

modm_target_config_create(modm modm_arch_options modm_options modm_warnings)
target_include_directories(modm SYSTEM
  PUBLIC
  ext/gcc
  ext/gcc/libstdc++/include
  src
  PRIVATE
)

target_link_libraries(modm
  PUBLIC
    modm_arch_options
  PRIVATE
    project_options
    modm_options
    modm_warnings
  )
